features: 【Small size, large capacity, compact】This mini dishwasher can hold 4 bowls of rice, 7 plates, 3 large cups, 2 milk bottles, 12 tableware and forks; It is only 18.03 inches high, which is suitable for the height requirements of most kitchen cabinets.Subtract the lid of the tank and it's only 17.9 inches tall.

【Reasonable design, water leakage prevention】Dish washer double sprays on the upper and lower sides, high temperature and high pressure spray water, so that stains have nowhere to hide, reasonable design, solve the problem of water leakage

【washing dishes, purifying ingredients, multi-functional use】 Dishwashing machine can not only wash dishes, but also wash fruits and vegetables to remove pesticide residues, with the function of purifying ingredients and cleaning tableware

【Multiple program options, easy to operate】 The touch screen switch can select 5 washing programs. The operation is simple and convenient, and small dishwasher can meet different selection requirements
【Three-in-one function】With hot air drying mode, portable countertop dishwasher is equipped with the functions of dishwasher, dryer and cabinet to keep your tableware dry and odor-free.
【Portable, no installation required】Dishwasher countertop support 2 water supply modes, compact dishwasher built-in 5 L water tank, you can add water manually, or connect the faucet to work;
body.description: Efficient cleaning effect Fastest wash time Ultra-fast mode only takes 29 minutes The ChuMaste dishwasher uses a 360 degree spiral high-pressure spray arm, and there is no dead space for the upper and lower double spray cleaning dishes. The washed dishes are as clean as new. *During use, please make sure that the filter of the machine is installed firmly. Otherwise, if it is used for a long time, the mouth of the upper and lower spray arms will be blocked by food residue, which may cause the spray arm not to rotate, thereby affecting the cleaning effect. *Please note that the tableware should not block the upper and lower double spray arms before use, otherwise the spray arm will not rotate during the washing process, which will affect the washing effect.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It's never been easier with the ChuMaste Portable Countertop Dishwasher The ChuMaste Portable Compact Countertop Dishwasher is designed for hands-free use. Instead of standing at the sink agonizingly washing plates, cutlery, and forks, you can relive happy times with family and friends. Ideal for apartments, dorms, offices, boats, RVs or any small kitchen; Dishwasher machine size (length*width*height): 16.54*16.54*18.03 (inches) 420*420*458mm Machine internal size: (length*width*height) 13.78*13.39*12.6 in 350*340*320mm Inlet pipe L=1.5m gray Pipe outer diameter φ12.5mm, straight American thread, elbow G3/4" *Every product needs to be tested for moisture when it leaves the factory, so it is normal for a small amount of residual moisture in the equipment. * The power button needs to be pressed and held for 2 seconds to turn it on. It is not acceptable to click it directly. Put your finger on it and press it for a long time! *After turning on the power switch, the portable dishwasher will drain water before starting to work. The draining time is 30 seconds, and then it will automatically fill with water. The water filling time will be 30 seconds, and finally starts working. * The water hose we equipped is suitable for most faucets and can be directly connected to the faucet. If it is not suitable, you can directly buy another converter, it will not affect your use! If you don't want to connect to the tap, you can also choose to add water to the water tank manually.

Efficient cleaning effect Fastest wash time Ultra-fast mode only takes 29 minutes The ChuMaste dishwasher uses a 360 degree spiral high-pressure spray arm, and there is no dead space for the upper and lower double spray cleaning dishes. The washed dishes are as clean as new. *During use, please make sure that the filter of the machine is installed firmly. Otherwise, if it is used for a long time, the mouth of the upper and lower spray arms will be blocked by food residue, which may cause the spray arm not to rotate, thereby affecting the cleaning effect. *Please note that the tableware should not block the upper and lower double spray arms before use, otherwise the spray arm will not rotate during the washing process, which will affect the washing effect. what's in this box drain pipe Inlet hose cutlery rack fruit and vegetable basket cutlery box manual water glass

Choose ChuMaste dishwasher,enjoy life * When the machine puts the tableware, there will be a short blue light, and there is no blue light during the washing process, which is a normal phenomenon. * There is a dedicated area on the door panel for storing dishwasher detergent tablets. ＊It is recommended to use dishwashing blocks. Other alternatives are also good, but please make sure that there are not too many bubbles and ensure that the dishwasher can work normally. **It is recommended to take out the tableware promptly after cleaning. If there is no ventilation for a long time, water vapor will form. The dishes will automatically start drying after washing. You also have the option of pressing the Heat Dry button again at the end of the wash cycle to let the dishes dry again individually. *The dishwasher should be sprayed 360°, and the tableware should not be placed too crowded. The cup should be upside down. *For tableware with oil stains, it is recommended to choose normal washing and strong washing, and quick washing is only for tableware with almost no oil stains.

Choose a more energy-saving way to save time and effort Hand washing, our hands will inevitably leave oil and other dirt, and the cleanliness of manual dishwashing is only 60% of the cleanliness of automatic dishwashing. With ChuMaste compact dishwasher, a full wash cycle consumes only 5L of water, which is only 1/3 of that of hand washing. The power consumption during work is only (0.42 kw.h), and it is an excellent energy-saving helper for every family.

Countertop dishwasher that can wash small pots Precautions during cleaning *Please clean the upper arm of the machine regularly, the lower spray arm and the bottom filter to avoid blocking. Before use, please manually pour a large piece of food residue. Make sure the filter at the bottom is firmly installed instead of loose. *Put the amount of dishwashing powder on the instruction manual, do not be too much or too little. *Make sure that the tableware is not stuck in the upper and lower arms, and the tableware can be sprayed by the spray arm.
The included fruit basket keeps fruits and vegetables neatly stored and cleaned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and powerful
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this purchase. I recently moved to an apartment without a dishwasher. Hating washing dishes my whole life, I bought my previous countertop dishwasher, which unfortunately started to leak after a few uses, and thus I had to switch to a tank-filled version. This one is indeed much smaller and trying to fit all dishes often takes some effort (especially large plates with thick rim and deep bowls), but virtually all water tank dishwashers are like this, and I just use it daily. It’s actually less annoying than those that require a tap connection, since I still have access to my kitchen sink while this dishwasher is running. It also cleans very well, and the operation is pretty simple and straightforward.One thing I particularly like about this cutie is the height. If you also have your kitchen cabinets hanging low and are worried about fitting a dishwasher on the table, remember to measure the space you have and check the height of the product. And probably look no further. Dishwasher models with water tanks are usually tall, and this one is the shortest I could find on Amazon, which fits on my counter so PERFECT (see picture).Also liked the light and the cup tray, which actually holds large utensils that are too tall for the utensil basket pretty well bc the spikes that keep stuff in place. My only complaints are that the wheels on the rack often go off track when pulled out, and that water sometimes spills out when filling the tank. Great product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my rv. But tried it in the house. Works great . Cleans excellent. Perfect for 1 or 2 people on the go. Load the meal dishes. Fill it with water and walk away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Met all my expectations
reviews.reviewText: Well designed and functional. I'm not allowed to make modifications to my HUD apartment so this solved that problem with the attached drain in the sink and pouring 1 1/4 gallons of water any temperature into the top. When needed the water is heated internally to boiling. Note: Cups with indented bottoms need to be set on their sides or they will not dry. In addition to the pre-set wash cycle times, drying time is one hour. I've used the 30 minute "quick wash" every time so far and everything is clean. Drop a powder pod into the bottom or fill the indented area in the lid. There is no assembly. Clamp on hose and go. The drain is not high intensity so no splashes and works with slow drains. When left plugged in a VERY LOW speed silent fan will continue to dry the unit with the door shut. A typical full load is cooking and dining ware for two people. It's lighter than a 1100W microwave and I have it on a roll around cart to increase my tight counter space. Tank fill pitcher and vegi-fruit cleaning bowl included. It makes no more or maybe even less noise than a microwave. I have a sensitive cat who is not bothered by it. At most uses 7.92 amps so plenty of power room left on a 20 amp circuit for other appliances. Everything needing cleaning inside is easy and detachable. Only minor complaint is the water full alarm is VERY soft so those hard of hearing will have to keep an eye on the add water display to see it go out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this! Being disabled, it's very difficult for me to wash dishes leaning over the sink. I find myself in immediate pain after washing one or two plates, so my kitchen was frequently messy and now that I have this little wonder of a portable dishwasher hooked right up to the sink. My kitchen is spotless all the time. There's never any dishes in the sink. When the dishwasher is done I put the dishes away and then put my dirty dishes in there as I go and then just wash them. It doesn't take long and it does a fantastic job. If there's anybody out there that lives alone and hates to do dishes, this item is for you. It's quiet, it is easy to use and it gets the job done. I have also used the fruit and vegetable washing feature. That is really cool as well. Gets everything nice and clean removes any wax they put on at the store and bam you're ready to go. If I could give this 12 stars I would

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing was fairly easy to set up. Will not fit under a standard cabinet, would have been nice if it had. The dimensions listed are accurate. It does make some noise running.....and is running at the edge of the living room, since it won't fit under the cabinets. Other than that, it works great, gets the stuff fairly dry, and is much easier to use than the bigger dishwasher.

reviews.reviewTitle: What a wonderful help to my life!!
reviews.reviewText: I just got this on Friday, I know that that’s a little early for most people to believe that I can rate this with this much confidence, in such a short period of time. However, I had some company over throughout the holidays, as well as during this first week of 2024! I’m disabled and it’s hard for me to stand to do dishes, or anything for that matter, for long periods of time. I did have to rinse a couple of items as you can’t expect utter miracles with older stuck on food! Anyway, it works spectacularly! My dishes have been coming out really clean. I did about 3 sets of dishes the first day! The only thing is, is that I can’t seem to be able to start the 73 hours of clean air, that you can use to help keep the inside dry when not using it. I tried to use it yesterday, and my intent is/was to be able to leave it on all night in the future. It only worked for about an hour, and after doing it twice, it still wasn’t totally water free. The instructions on this particular feature, are not exactly easy to understand or follow. It isn’t featured very prominently, almost as an afterthought. Maybe the seller should pay a little more attention to this feature, as I think it’s just as important as using the machine for it’s intended purpose. It’s just as important to keep the machine clean as it is to have it clean your dishes. No clean machine, not that great clean dishes, no?! That’s the only thing that I can think of, so far, as a negative, and that’s saying a lot! Thank you ChuMaste for making my life so much easier!
Somos una familia de dos personas, solo la ocupamos una vez al día con los platos de todas las comidas. Nos encanta

reviews.reviewerName: 吉瀬　毅吉瀬　毅
reviews.reviewText: 朝から晩までこれ程食器洗いが面倒くさい行動だとは思わなかった。文明の利器でクロリティーオブライフがバク上がりしました。想像以上に大きかったですが、それが１日分を全て飲み込んで洗浄してくれています。工事不要で注水出来ますが、給水は洗濯機と同じニップルがあればそちらがオススメです。水道管を二股にするだけの通常工事になります。それ程高くないと思いますし、DIYのレベルなので検討中です。とにかく簡単でした！！

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my little Househusband, and to say he was thrilled would be an understatement!My Husband, bless his heart, really hates doing the dishes. Cooking, cleaning the toilet, fetching my slippers when I come home from a long, hard day at the office - he could do those sort of things all day and never tire of them. But dishes? Well, let's just say there's a lot of "soaking" happening in our kitchen!That's why I really wanted to treat him this Holiday season - he always has dinner ready and on the table when I get home at 5:30pm and spends a lot of time making sure he looks handsome for me (coming home to a handsome, clean, well put together man is a must for hardworking women like me). So I spent 10 minutes thinking of what to get him for Christmas before it came to me; a dishwasher!Now you should know that this dishwasher comes in a box that reveals EXACTLY what's inside, so keep that in mind if it's a gift. The deliverywoman left the box outside of our apartment door and my Husband saw it and just could NOT wait until Christmas day to use it, so I chuckled and allowed him to open the box and place the dishwasher on our kitchen counter. His eyes sparkled with unshed, joyful tears. He was almost as happy as that year I got him a new toilet scrub brush for his birthday!Now, we all know being a Househusband isn't hard work, am I right ladies? I mean, he probably spends half the day sitting on his cute little toosh, eating bon bons and reading men's magazines (I'm not actually sure what he does)!But what DOES work hard is this dishwasher. My Husband has used it over and over again since he received it last week and it has done the job beautifully every time. The dishes are always clean when he takes them out, the water is easy to replenish (my Husband fills the machine with the included pitcher and it plays a delightful little tune when there's enough water) and being able to see through the front door and watch the water slosh around has kept my Husband entertained for HOURS! No more listening to him ramble on about Ryan Reynolds or the latest graphics card or whatever his cute little brain is preoccupied with that week!I couldn't be happier with our new little kitchen helper, and it's certainly given my Househusband more time to attend to my needs.So if you're a hard-working woman with a little fella at home who just HATES getting his hands wrinkly in dishwater like mine, this is the perfect gift! Now if I could only just get him to stop talking so much!

The media could not be loaded. Nos llegó la máquina pero cuando la abrimos estaba mojada, creemos que no era nueva, se nos hizo raro, después la parte de la pantalla tenía una etiqueta que decía "remover" nos dimos cuenta que solo era esa esquina de la etiqueta, porque el plástico real de la pantalla ya había sido removido y los rayones que tenia no estában sobre algún plástico, estaban sobre la pantalla.Otro de los plásticos laterales de protección tambien venía roto... Decidimos prenderla para ver si funcionaba, y en efecto si funcionaba, pero tenia 3 problemas:1) Como claramente era usada, y no sabíamos por cuanto tiempo lo había sido (cuando viene con rayones importantes, dejo foto) era no tener la garantía de un producto nuevo.2) Al poner el ciclo de lavado metimos algunos platos y cubiertos, solo se lavaron bien los trastes que realmente estaban casi limpios, los que llegaban a tener algo salsa se quedaron manchados de salsa, sobre todo en cubiertos.3) Todos los ciclos de lavado incluyen 60min de secado por calor y esto no se puede detener o controlar, más el ciclo normal de lavado de más de una hora, son más de 2 horas para lavar platos que no están realmente sucios (porque recordemos que los que tiene salsa pegada los debes lavar a mano, eso dice el manual)En general no es un mal electrodoméstico, pero esta muuuy limitado en capacidades y limpieza, esto sumado a que llego mojado... Lo regresamos al siguiente día.
